## R Markdown



```{r}
library(Text.Replace)

# Example on the Survey Data
# data set located on another machine due to permissions
dats = data(surveyData)
survey_df = data.frame(dats)

survey_corpus = Text.Replace::create_corpus(survey_df, "comments")

survey_dfm = Text.Replace:::create_dfm(survey_corpus,
                                     tolower = TRUE,
                                     stem = FALSE,
                                     select = NULL,
                                     remove = NULL,
                                     dictionary = NULL,
                                     thesaurus = NULL,
                                     groups = NULL,
                                     ngrams = 1,
                                     remove_punct = T)


```

```{r, fig.width=10, eval=FALSE}
survey_dfm_trim = quanteda::dfm_trim(survey_dfm, min_termfreq = 10)

# basic wordcloud
quanteda::textplot_wordcloud(survey_dfm_trim)
```
